title: Meeting Notes 1
content: Discuss project updates and plan for the next sprint.
action_items: Assign tasks for the next sprint
Address any blockers mentioned by the team

title: Meeting Notes 2
content: Brainstorming session for new feature ideas.
action_items: Define user stories for the selected features

title: Task Planning
content: Plan tasks for the upcoming week.

title: Project Review
content: Review the progress of the ongoing project.
action_items: Check completion status of project milestones

title: Client Meeting
content: Prepare for an upcoming client meeting.
action_items: Prepare a demo of the latest features
Discuss client feedback and address concerns
